title: Is the American curriculum easier than the British? - Quora
tags: Education in the United States of America

response.answer_text: It is different, I am not so sure about which is better or easier. British education, particularly after age16, tends to be much more specialised than US (or most European). That means that the US studies a broader range of subjects, but it also means they have to do an extra year to get a degree in their specialised subject to catch up.
